channel.title: BREAKING : W3C Technical Architecture Group (TAG) election result
channel.description:
# W3C Technical Architecture Group (TAG) election result
“ **The W3C Advisory Committee has elected the following people to the W3C Technical Architecture Group (TAG):**
@rhiaro [Dr.] Amy Guy (Digital Bazaar) [!], Sangwhan Moon (W3C Invited Expert) [!] […] and Lea Verou (W3C Invited Expert) [!].”
https://www.w3.org/blog/news/archives/8846

W3C Technical Architecture Group

That’s terrific news!!
